data.message: I've been contacted by two individuals posing as employees at Facebook.  The one wrote me that you asked her to call me because I was the winner of a Facebook contest.  Long story short, I won $600,000 and all I had to do was send $500, $750, or $1,000 to release the prize and have it sent FedEx Delivery Co. to me.  Just wanted you to know about the scam artist on FB who post that they work there.  Thanks.

replies.message: Hi Dolly. This sounds like a hoax. We strongly suggest that you don't provide any personal information and report spam using these tips: http://on.fb.me/1RHbZ1v. Thanks for helping keep Facebook safe. -Rey
